docs.summary:
The wix-crm-backend module contains functionality for working with
 your site's [price quotes](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-price-quotes)
 from backend code.
description: To use the Price Quotes API, import `wixCrm` from the `wix-crm-backend` module:
```javascript
import wixCrm from 'wix-crm-backend';

params.name: PriceQuoteInfo
params.doc: The data used to create a price quote.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID and version of the created price quote.

docs.summary: Creates a new price quote.
description: The `createPriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the created price quote's
ID and version when the price quote is created.

examples.title: Create a new price quote

notes: The customer listed on the price quote must be an existing site contact or member.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID of the price quote to delete.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified price quote is deleted.

docs.summary: Deletes a price quote by ID.
description: The `deletePriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the price quote with the specified ID is deleted.

examples.title: Delete a price quote by ID

params.name: id
params.doc: The ID of the price quote to get.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The price quote with the given ID.

docs.summary: Gets an existing price quote by ID.
description: The `getPriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the price quote
with the specified ID.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the price quote to send.

params.name: emailInfo
params.doc: Information used when sending the email.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified price quote is sent.

docs.summary: Sends a price quote preview link to a customer via email.
description: The `sendPriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the price quote with the specified ID and version is sent to the customer
listed on the price quote.
Use the `emailOptions` parameter to specify the subject and body of the email
sent to the customer.

examples.title: Send a price quote to a customer
Get the price quote version and send the price quote to a customer

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the price quote to send.

params.name: sendPriceQuoteToCustomerRequest
params.doc: Additional data that will be used for the send.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - When the specified price quote is sent.

docs.summary: email a price quote preview link or pdf to the customer set on it..
description: The `sendPriceQuoteToCustomer()` function returns a Promise that resolves
when the price quote with the specified ID is sent.

params.name: id
params.doc: ID and version of the price quote to update.

params.name: PriceQuoteInfo
params.doc: The data used to update a price quote.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - ID and version of the updated price quote.

docs.summary: Updates an existing price quote.
description: The `updatePriceQuote()` function returns a Promise that resolves to the updated price quote's
ID and version when the price quote is updated.
If the existing price quote contains information that is not included
in the updated price quote, that information is lost. For example, if a price
quote contains metadata information, but when updating the quote no metadata information is
sent, the updated quote will not have any metadata.

examples.title: Update an existing price quote

notes: The customer listed on the price quote must be an existing site contact or member.

docs.summary: An object that contains address information.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains calculated tax information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains customer information.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains discount information.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Update an existing price quote

members.name: type
members.doc:
Discount type.

Either:

+ `"Fixed"`: A fixed amount is deducted.
+ `"Percentage"`: A percentage of the total amount is deducted.

docs.summary: An object that contains information used to send a price quote to a customer.

examples.title: Send a price quote to a customer
Get the price quote version and send the price quote to a customer

members.name: body
members.doc:
Email body. Limited formatting in the email body can be
achieved using standard JavaScript string formatting.

docs.summary: An object that contains Error result information.
An object that contains ID and version information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID
Update an existing price quote

docs.summary: An object that contains itemized fee information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains line item information.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains tax information for a line item.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains locale information.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: language
members.doc:
An IETF language tag.
Some common language tags include:

+ `"en-US"`: English, United States
+ `"en-GB"`: English, British
+ `"es-ES"`: Spanish, Spain
+ `"de-DE"`: German, Germany
+ `"ja-JP"`: Japanese, Japan
+ `"fr-CH"`: French, Switzerland
+ `"it-IT"`: Italian, Italy

docs.summary: An object that contains metadata information.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

docs.summary: An object that contains information about price quote payment terms.

examples.title: Create a new price quote
Get a price quote by ID

members.name: termType
members.doc:
Price quote term type.
 One of:

 + `"DueOnReceipt"`
 + `"NetPlus"`
 + `"TimeStamp"`
 + `"Other"`

members.name: termData
members.doc:
Term data. When `termType` is `"NetPlus"`,
 `termData` contains a positive integer indicating how many days after the charge
 payment is due.

docs.summary: An object that represents a price quote.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: id
members.doc: ID and version of the price quote.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the price quote.
 One of:

 + `"Draft"`
 + `"Sent"`
 + `"Processing"`
 + `"Accepted"`
 + `"Rejected"`
 + `"Expired"`
 + `"Void"`
 + `"Deleted"`
 + `"Invoiced"`

members.name: number
members.doc: Number of the price quote, unique within your site.

members.name: customer
members.doc: Customer listed on the price quote.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items listed on the price quote.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount included in the price quote.

members.name: taxes
members.doc: List of taxes calculated based on the line items.

members.name: metadata
members.doc: Additional metadata included in the price quote.

members.name: invoiceId
members.doc: Price quote invoice ID, when converting price quote to invoice.

members.name: dates
members.doc: Dates associated with the price quote.

docs.summary: An object that contains date information for a price quote.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID
Create a new price quote

members.name: issueDate
members.doc: Date the price quote was issued.

members.name: validThroughDate
members.doc: Date that the price quote is valid until.

members.name: acceptanceDate
members.doc: Date the price quote was accepted.

members.name: lastSeenDate
members.doc: Date the price quote was last seen.

docs.summary: An object that contains information used when creating or updating a price quote.

members.name: discount

members.name: dates
members.doc: Dates associated with the price quote.

docs.summary: An object that contains price totals.

examples.title: Get a price quote by ID

members.name: taxedAmount
members.doc: Sum of line items tax amounts.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of the line items without the tax included.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price of the itemized fees and taxes.
